programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Bean’s phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Bean’s house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But it’s not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories don’t always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to show the Mushies that they should fly high and follow their dreams, Mushpie starts leaf-gliding for the first time.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff wants to impress Sushi-Mushi by showing him how he can use his fog to steam food. But Sushi-Mushi thinks Puff wants to be his cooking rival!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and Lilit discover that each of them has a favourite beetle. This is great! They’re beetle buddies! However this quickly turns into a competition on who has the ‘best’ beetle...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having learnt that Starmush overcame his fear of the Dark Forest by staying a night there when he was a Mushler, Mush-Mush and Lilit convince Chep that they should do the same. But will they end up fearless or fearful?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers’ home-tree isn’t big enough to store all of Chep’s collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them – and no way he’s letting them move out without him!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a crate of cell phones: there’s one for everyone. But before being able to play with their new toys, they need to charge the batteries. This operation uses all the electricity stored in the cabin’s solar battery and prevents Grizzy from watching TV. Grizzy soon realizes that this is the least of his worries, for living with the Lemmings and their phones is a guaranteed nonstop stream of noise pollution.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings’ strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that it’s his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a new passion: magic Chinese lanterns that they use for sound and light performances. Grizzy is not very enthusiastic about this new electric activity which keeps him from sleeping. While Grizzy thinks that he got rid of their lanterns, the Lemmings discover new high-tech lanterns capable of making even more of a ruckus.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings lay hands on an ancient console that lets you play life-sized games in the real world. The console emits magical streams of energy that randomly pick avatars to confront one another. Grizzy is chosen as the hero. He must leap onto platforms and confront both enemies and a fearsome leader: a panda equipped with bamboo sticks. The Lemmings are obviously in control of the joystick!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As the Lemmings rummage through an abandoned delivery tricycle filled with strange objects, they discover a delicious treasure: Yummy-filled Chinese brioches! Grizzy steals their tasty bounty and heads off to enjoy it alone in the cabin. The Lemmings find a mask in the tricycle that terrifies anyone who looks at it when it’s being worn by someone. The Lemmings intend to use their horrific new power to recover their stolen treats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a giant home cinema screen that transforms his favorite documentary film into an incredible light and sound experience. But his pleasure is ruined by the Lemmings’ fiesta. While he chases after his housemates to destroy their disco equipment, he discovers with astonishment that Asian clones of himself and the Lemmings are also engaged in a high-speed pursuit.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has anticipated everything for his birthday and plans on spending a peaceful day in the cabin doing his favorite activities. But when the Lemmings find out it’s Grizzy’s birthday, they devise other plans. Farewell, Grizzy’s peaceful day - make way for the Lemmings’ party surprises!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Nutty Hill is suffering from a stifling heat wave. Searching in vain for a bit of cool air, Grizzy suddenly has a brilliant idea. Hell get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. One slight detail, the refrigerator shelves are already full of Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV he discovers that the pantry is empty!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. Taking refuge in a trendy coffee bar, Bean is fascinated both by the brewing machinery andthe amount of money people will pay for small cups of coffee! Scenting a fortune to be made, Bean opens up his own, strange, successful coffee bar ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brings the gang to a fancy Ice Hotel co-owned by her family where a new exhibit of ice age artifacts is opening. Things heat up, however, when a frozen Ice Man thaws out and goes on a rampage inside the hotel. Solving the mystery becomes even more complicated when the gang realizes Daphne may just have ulterior motives for going to the hotel to begin with.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang heads to Shaggys beloved grandmothers Florida retirement home, where they learn a crazed Ape Man has been frightening the elderly residents.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. It’s up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer.

programme.title: Lu And The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: The bugs talk about times they felt disappointed.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sam Sheepdog hires The Looney Builders to build him a salon. Sam offers his custom cut only to learn that different folks want different styles. / Pro snowboarder Pepper Polar Bear hires The Looney Builders to build a ski resort. Pepper soon learns that others have different skill levels.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pro snowboarder Pepper Polar Bear hires The Looney Builders to build a ski resort. Pepper soon learns that others have different skill levels. / The Looney Builders are hired to build a rollercoaster for Looneyburg.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean takes part in a Fun Run. He starts next to his biggest enemy: the fat guy who stole his parking space. Fun Run or not, Bean is going to beat this guy at the finish line, even if he has to take a taxi along the way.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean panics when a monster appears in his cake mix—but it’s a baby bird that grows into a huge stork, soon taking over his entire home!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: It’s the night of the Big Dance, and Skinny has some serious moves ready to go. Shame we’ll never get to see them; Skinny practices so hard that he renders himself unconscious. Luckily Skinny has a guardian angel in the form of a morphing orange blob. Lamput tries everything to wake Skinny back up, but nothing works; Lamput is gonna have to go above and beyond. Skinny (still out cold) shows up to the dance in a bright orange suit that seems to have a life of its own, and proceeds to tear up the dancefloor. When Skinny finally comes to, he finds out he was the hit of the big dance. Skinny walks off with the trophy and the gal. No-one thinks to thank lil’ Lamput. For a sworn enemy, this blob sure is a good friend.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. It’s time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms assigned laundry duty at the estate and Jerrys determined to soil the job.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom finds himself trapped inside a Catsylvania bedtime story and fleeing from a furious Jabberwock.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After discovering a gray hair, Spikes decides hes too old to be the alpha of the house which sends Tom into full bully mode. Jerry will have to act fast to convince Spike hes still the alpha dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its the battle of the moustaches when Tom accidentally drinks a hair tonic potion left behind by Jerry – and Butch realizes he needs to acquire some facial hair of his own if he is to compete for Toodles and Dollfaces attentions.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An evil ringmaster recruits Tom to help him snare the Catsylvania mice.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerrys antics unearth an autographed baseball – a childhood souvenir of Ricks – he warns Tom to keep his paws off it, or else! Tom attempts to obey, but Jerrys got other ideas and the ball gets out of hand. The guys chase the treasured ball all over the neighborhood, recovering it only to lose it again. And again. And again.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile, Kitty, to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of Bat-Ball, but the Kitty Kitty is too wild to be contained, despite Bams best attempts to convince her to play along.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De gang gaat naar een festival voor de Dag van de Doden. Daar komen ze erachter dat de geest van een oude legendarische crimineel, El Bandito, is teruggekeerd om de bevolking angst aan te jagen. Fred raakt geobsedeerd met het mysterie en wil onderdeel van de legende worden.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to watch her friends kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus’ sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santa’s magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks he’s won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast racing down the ice slope in competition with the stuffed Bear-Ranger and manage to win each time. Grizzy cannot stand seeing his avatar humiliated and he decides to enter the competition to help him. Their frenzied descent gets out of hand and everyone is propelled all the way to the hangar of the research station, where they discover an ultra-sophisticated racing game. The racecourse sprawls over the entire icefield via drones that project holographic elements. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings shave ice from the icefield and whip it into granita, but the result is flavorless. He decides to make granita in an empty jar of Yummy so that the chocolate left over on the sides of the jar will flavor the dessert. It’s delicious! The Lemmings, who consider it was their recipe, swap the chocolate granita with another one made in an old flowerpot with potting soil. The choco-granito race is off and running!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are starving for their reserves are depleted and their fishing has been unsuccessful. Fortunately, a truck delivers a crate of edibles to the research station that contains compact food cubes. When placed under a special light beam, the cubes retransform into delicious meals. Grizzy discovers that the decompressing lamp can, conversely, compact organic elements too. For example, the Lemmings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings pace around the log cabin searching for virtual animals to capture with their tablet game. Annoyed by their behavior, Grizzy throws them outside. Determined to continue playing, the Lemmings trick the bear. But when the tablet hits the circuit breaker and explodes, the gaming animals come to life! Ice dinosaurs, laser caribous and giant carnivorous plants. The life-size hunt can begin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A snowstorm rips the solar panels off the log cabin and Grizzy can no longer watch TV or enjoy the comforts of home! But he has a brilliant idea. He produces electricity by making a caribou run on a treadmill, using the last carrot in the house as bait. But the Lemmings absolutely want his carrot to make the perfect snowman.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers in shock that the TV has been replaced with a trompe-l’oeil image. Furious, he flushes the Lemmings out of their hiding place where they’d hoped to watch their favorite cartoon in peace and propels them as far as possible. They land in an ancient cave where a powerful spirit capable of entering individuals is asleep. The Lemmings decide to free the spirit and send it to Grizzy. But will they be able to control the spirit?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Not easy to enjoy a DVD about salmon when the Lemmings are having a disco party right there. Grizzy sends them packing with such force that they land at the research station, where they discover a state-of-the-art U.V. cabin. When turned up to the max, the light therapy and music options can advantageously replace the disco equipment Grizzy destroyed. The noise they make causes a block of ice to break off. It hurdles down the slope to the cabin and destroys Grizzy’s TV. But it doesn’t take the bear long to figure out that the U.V. cabin also has a DVD function.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estates chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchesss new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Toms cleaning efforts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom finds out he won a contest to be in a cat food commercial, his behavior turns smug. This irritates Jerry, who goes to great lengths to ruin the commercial shoot at the house as Tom struggles in his role.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but wont pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: As Jerry and Tuffy play marbles, Tom throws a soccer ball in their direction and upsets the game. This sparks a chase between Tom and Jerry, and Jerry takes cover in a room that looks like a giant chessboard. As more chess pieces show up, Tom and Jerry attempt their best to outplay them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is framed for a crime he did not commit and is sent to prison. Jerry works to clear his name.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Gingers mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but its no vacation. The cousins missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toodles the Witch mesmerizes Tom in a haunted castle, and poses a threat to Jerry and Tuffy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After entering Tyke in an agility contest, Spike sets up a course for the puppy in the backyard. Soon, Spike decides the course isnt hard enough and gets Tom to help, bending Tom into pretzel-like positions for Tyke to leap over, through, or into. After all this preparation, Tyke must still make it to the competition on time.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. Can Bibi get free in time to unmask the imposter and save the day?

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Green Arrow and his Arrowplane, Goldie, come to help Batman take on the Riddler. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around that she brings Goldie to life and the two become BFFs. But when Goldie eventually has to leave, Batwing learns that saying goodbye doesnt always mean forever!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her as a Batwheel - if he can convince her to stop playing long enough to focus on their mission!

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batcaves cutest resident bat Alfie sneaks into Bam the Batmobile and causes adorable chaos during a mission to stop the Ducky Boat down at Gotham Docks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Marvin the Martian crash lands in Looneyburg, he’s in a hurry to leave and hires The Looney Builders to build him a spaceship.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build a doghouse on Mars for his puppy, K-9. Daffy soon bonds with K-9 and comes up with a plan to prolong their playtime.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a giant jelly cake. Their chase leads them to the castle library, where the Lemmings accidentally activate the opening of a secret passage.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput on a boat out at sea, Skinny is enchanted by the music of sirens who are taken by his singing. The sirens take a hypnotized Skinny away to their island where he is to sing for them or be a prisoner. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: In an accident during a chase, Lamput ends up getting stuck to Specs! Since they are literally inseparable, they bond over time until Boss commands Specs to return to the Lab.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput decides to help distressed duck parents find their missing children. But the ducklings are too much for him to handle!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean is stuck in a lift and starts to annoy the other passengers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece –featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes to the beach to get a tan, but when the countryman arrives and prevents him from exposing to the sun, he is trying to find another place. And when the nimbus cloud covers the sun, he starts to desperately chase the beam of sunlight across London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: De favoriete chef van Shaggy en Scooby opent eindelijk zijn eigen restaurant maar een monsterlijke yeti bedreigt de openingsavond. De gang moet het mysterie oplossen voordat het dessert wordt opgediend, terwijl Shaggy en Scooby de verleiding moeten weerstaan om al het eten op te eten dat voor de klanten bedoeld is!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne always dreamed of meeting extra terrestrial life but that dream becomes a nightmare when the gang gets caught up in the mystery of a scary Alien Monster.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy takes the Gang to the Minor League Baseball stadium of his youth only to learn that its about to be shut down because a Ghostly Baseball Player is scaring away the fans!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When an Artificial Intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerized mystery - and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne flying a plane!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a rich man writes Scooby into his will, the gang must spend a night in his creepy mansion with kooky relatives and a spooky phantom to collect Scoobys share.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a science museum in the desert where Wile E. Coyote becomes distracted by the Road Runner.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Mayor Leghorn hires The Looney Builders to build a water wheel in the forest where Porky worries about a mythical creature named “Big Feet.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build Tibs Squirrel a closet in his tree, but it won’t fit all of Tibs’ stuff and he doesn’t want to get rid of anything.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders enter a sandcastle building contest, Tweety sees the competition and loses confidence in his idea.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Hector hires The Looney Builders to build him a burger restaurant, but Daffy is so focused on beating his handheld game that he causes major setbacks.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he takes down Riddler with an impressive wheel slam move, the Batwheels give Buff the nickname Tough Buff. But Buff abruptly bristles at the name, leading the Batwheels to realize that its not okay to call your friends nicknames that they dont like.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After being zapped by Penguins Songinator ray, the Batwheels find themselves only able to communicate through song! Theyll need to learn to harmonize as a team to defeat the musical prankster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave, unbeknownst to the rest of the Bat-Family.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Jestah injures herself preparing for an extreme sports competition with the other Zoomers, Bibi helps her overcome her fear of going to the mechanic so she can heal up in time to compete.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buffs trusty winch is knocked out of action by Poison Ivy, he must learn to improvise and come up with creative solutions on the fly.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Snowy and Jestah team up to execute a mysterious plan involving rare freeze-berries, Batwing and Buff pair up to take on the dastardly duo, but Batwing decides to carry out the mission herself, putting both her and Buff at risk.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Sushi-Mushi’s excitement and pride over Chanterelle doing a portrait of him to hang in his restaurant turns to worry. What if his friends don’t like it? But, of course, Chanterelle would never let that happen.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to show the Mushies that they should fly high and follow their dreams, Mushpie starts leaf-gliding for the first time.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff wants to impress Sushi-Mushi by showing him how he can use his fog to steam food. But Sushi-Mushi thinks Puff wants to be his cooking rival!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and Lilit discover that each of them has a favourite beetle. This is great! They’re beetle buddies! However this quickly turns into a competition on who has the ‘best’ beetle...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having learnt that Starmush overcame his fear of the Dark Forest by staying a night there when he was a Mushler, Mush-Mush and Lilit convince Chep that they should do the same. But will they end up fearless or fearful?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers’ home-tree isn’t big enough to store all of Chep’s collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them – and no way he’s letting them move out without him!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover that several drops of Tabasco sauce poured into a rock fault releases powerful sprays of steam that propel them high into the sky on a pot lid.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have decided to organize a race with two sand yachts they found on the beach. The only thing missing, is a worthy adversary. They put Grizzy, who was taking a nap, on one of the yachts without waking him up. And the race is off. Grizzy wakes up in shock onboard his sand yacht.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. He confiscates the crustacean and uses it to take the tops off his coconuts. As they fight over the crab, the characters discover a remote-control device in a secret grotto that operates a giant crab. Grizzy takes over the controls, but the Lemmings want to play with the joystick too!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A helicopter takes off from the beach, leaving behind installations for a TV game, namely lots of food supplies – which are locked up. To access the keys and the food, participants must win team tests under the surveillance of a drone. The Lemmings are the yellow team. The red team is comprised of Grizzy, an oar, and a flabbergasted crab!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to avoid the Lemmings outboard speedboat, Grizzy punctures his air mattress and is propelled into a hidden grotto where he finds a conch decorated with Maori symbols that can control whales. Grizzy returns, proudly straddling his cetacean and chases the Lemmings from his peaceful spot. But the Lemmings imagination is equal to the size of this potential new playmate!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While arguing over a jar of Yummy, Grizzy and the Lemmings happen upon a polar bear cub who is crying. When the little bear sees them, he wails even louder. Annoyed by his sobs, Grizzy and the rodents try to pacify him, but nothing works. After feeding and changing him, the baby finally falls asleep. How can they pick up their Yummy battle without waking the cub?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this bears privilegeexcept the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

Now were digging in to find out if its a volcanic super-Earth, an icy mega-Pluto or a gaseous giant like Neptune.

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: How Its Made

programme.title: Alien Highway

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun Isa vie Blueyn ja Bingon vaunuretkelle puistoon aikaisin aamulla, Bluey ei malta odottaa paastakseen rakkaalle kiipeilytelineelleen. Karsivallisyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun Isa pysahtyy juttelemaan ystaviensa kanssa. Turhautunut Bluey keskeyttaa aikuisten keskustelut. Isa kaskee olemaan kohtelias, mutta vasta kun han huomaa Bingon leikkivan onnellisena, han tajuaa itsekin voivansa leikkia. Kun Isa seuraavan kerran pysahtyy juttelemaan bussipysakin lahelle, Bluey kehittaa Bingon kanssa oman bussileikkinsa ja houkuttelee Isankin mukaan. Kun kiire on ohi, Bluey rentoutuu ja nauttii matkasta.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace vaihtaa paikkaa kaksoisolentonsa, Druselsteinin prinsessan, kanssa ja Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaisjukeboksin. Silla valin Perry yrittaa estaa Tollontyota pilaamasta kaupungin uuden oopperatalon avajaisia. / Vanhemmat ovat matkoilla ja Candace kutsuu pari kaveriaan kylaan, mutta pian illanvietosta kasvaa valtavat juhlat. Tollontyo yrittaa saada kerrostalon haviamaan voidakseen katsoa naapurin drive-in -teatterin elokuvia ilmaiseksi.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on vastuussa veljistaan silla aikaa kun vanhemmat ovat lomalla. Kun han kuulee, etta pojat aikovat matkustaa maailman ympari ja nauttia kesan pisimmasta paivasta, han lahtee harkitsematta heidan mukaansa. Bufordin, Baljeetin ja Isabellan kanssa kolmikko suuntaa Japaniin ja Ranskaan, jossa he oppivat uskomaan mahdottomiinkin asioihin. Buford lyo vetoa, etteivat Finias ja Ferb onnistu luomaan historian pisinta kesapaivaa… vaikka han salaa pitaakin heille peukkuja. Tohtori Tollontyo kidnappaa majuri Sahkeisen, jonka oli tarkoitus luennoida Hyvisten konferenssissa. Tollontyon tytar Vanessa ei ensin ilahdu siita, etta isa ottaa tyoasioita mukaan lomalle, mutta lopuksi tytto huomaa, etta hanenkin sisallaan asuu pieni pahis.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Saatuaan hammaskeijulta viiden dollarin setelin, Bluey on innoissaan menossa Isan kanssa kauppoihin kayttamaan rahansa! Mutta tutkiessaan kauppojen hyllyja ystavansa Indyn kanssa, on yha vaikeampi ostaa jotain. Kun tarjolla on kaikkea hevoskyydeista pannukakkuihin, on vaikea valita! Paniikinomaisen herateostoksen johdosta Bluey harmittelee, ettei voi ostaa laulua katusoittajalta. Indyn vakuuttelu, etta ”sen minka taakseen jattaa, edestaan loytaa” pitaa paikkansa kun viiden dollarin seteli matkaa ympari kauppaa ja Bluey saa uuden mahdollisuuden.

programme.title: Tuuri

programme.title: Big City Greens
programme.desc: Cricket tahtoo valttaa rangaistuksen, joten hanen taytyy saada jarkeva isansa uskomaan avaruusolentoihin.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Vernoni kulastab ootamatult tema ja Bernie sartsakas ning riskivalmis poolõde. Tricial ja Mikeil on raske aeg - naine ootab suhetes selgust, kuid Mike pelgab end siduda. Solvunud Tricia võtab vastu võidusõiduhobuste treeneri lahke kutse ja laseb end kiskuda saatuslikku avantuuri.

programme.title: Tana õhtul..
programme.desc: Uno Loobi muusikat armastavad nii vanad „Horoskoobi“ fanaatikud kui ka noored elektroonilise muusika huvilised - viimased neist on isegi asutanud ansambli The Unoloops! Millist varvi on armastus, naeme seekordse stuudiokontserdi publiku ja saatejuhi Vahur Kersna nagudelt.

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: Ringvaade toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Grete Lõbu ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Terevisioon
programme.desc: „Terevisioonis on koos uudised, ilmateade, olulised jutuajamised ja mõnusad kulalised. Saravad saatejuhid Katrin Viirpalu, Martha-Beryl Grauberg, Juhan Kilumets ja Reimo Sildvee annavad endast parima, et kõik teie paevad algaksid energiliselt ning hasti. Režissoorid Elo Selirand ja Johanna Maria Vilgats, produtsent Rait Roland Veskemaa

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Elu lugu
programme.desc: Kui on tahtmine kuulata vantorelit ehk leierkasti, siis tuleb Tartus ules otsida Ingrid Kalev, kes on Eestis ainuke naine, kellel on selline pill ja kes sellega ka esinemas kaib. Autor Aivi Parijõgi, režissoor Mati Kark.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Jeronimot hairib Pelayo suhe Catalinaga. Cruz keeldub María suhtes umber mõtlemast. Simona usub, et Candela lahkus igaveseks. Vera teeb kõigile kingitused.

programme.title: Outrageous
programme.desc: Diana lahutab abielu ja riskib kõigega suhte parast Mosleyga. Unity liitub mustsarklastega. Ta kaib koos Dianaga Saksamaal Hitlerit kuulamas ja vaimustub fašismist uha rohkem. Nancy alustab lohutussuhet Peteriga.

programme.title: Ludwig
programme.desc: John ja tema meeskond naasevad kooli, et uurida koolidirektori kahtlast surma. Uurimise kaigus peab John silmitsi seisma omaenda ebameeldivate koolimalestustega, kuid teda ootab meeldiv ullatus, kui ta kohtub taas oma endise mentoriga, kes õpetas talle kõike, mida ta mõistatuste lahendamisest teab. Kui John on juhtumisse suvenenud, jargneb Lucy uuele jaljele, mis võiks teda viia sammukese lahemale Jamesi leidmisele. Lucy salajane missioon viib ta Walesi.

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike on parast Tricia surma masenduses ja laheb pubis noore riiukukega liiga agedaks. Politsei on hammingus, kui rahukohtunik aitab poisil karistamatult vabaks saada. Nooruk šantažeerib rahukohtunikku ja talle sõidetakse autoga otsa. Mike lahendab kohtunik Robinsoni perekonnasaladuse ja tabab briljandivargad. Vernon pakub koolipõlvekallimale abi, kuid kahetseb seda kibedasti.

programme.title: Õnne 13
programme.desc: Johannes veab Kristjanit ninapidi ja viimane saab pahaseks. Are annab Raimile mõista, et ei taha enam temaga tegemist teha. Allan ja Raim kohtuvad kohvikus ja jatkavad konjaki joomist Raimi juures. Laine sõidab Tallinnasse Evelinile kulla ja vestleb pikalt Ernaga. Evelin tuleb koju ilma Annabelita. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Ministrit ootab ees raske operatsioon ning Jari vaevleb suumepiinades. Lenita avastab, et Jarmo on tema juures kainud. Jesse saab halbu uudiseid.

programme.title: La Promesa
programme.desc: Abel keeldub koju naasmast. Feliciano valmistub Currot jahil saatma. Lorenzo ahvardab Pelayot. Jana palub Manuelilt vabandust.

programme.title: OP
programme.desc: Iganadalane kultuurikompass! Saatejuht Owe Petersell võtab vaataja kaasa kinno, teatrisse, naitusele, raamatupoodi, kontserdile ja mujalegi. Režissoor Antti Hakli, toimetajad Ave-Marleen Rei ja Ave Lutter.

programme.title: Sport
programme.desc: Sport

programme.title: Esimene stuudio
programme.desc: Saatesari avab erinevaid paevakajalisi teemasid, mis sunnivad meie igapaeva-elust, alates poliitikast ja majandusest, lõpetades sotsiaalia ning kultuuriga. Saatejuhid Andres Kuusk, Johannes Tralla, Mirko Ojakivi. Režissoor Maarika Lauri, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Meie õpetajad
programme.desc: Meie õpetajad jargmises osas kohtume Matilde Matverega - tallinlannaga, kes jattis sel aastal oma too filmikunsti maailmas ja kolis Narva. Eesti keele ja kirjanduse õpetajana aitab Matilde nuud Narva noortel tugevat keelepõhja luua. Saatejuht Uljana Kuzmina, režissoor Marten Vaher, toimetaja Jevgenia Volohhonskaja, produtsent Egle Beek.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joanna reis Euroopa pikimal jõel jatkub Austrias, võluvas Wachau orus, kus valmistati veini juba Vana-Rooma ajal. Sealt viib tee edasi rahvusparki, kus elavad Euroopa viimased kilpkonnad ja jargmisse Doonau teele jaavasse riiki Slovakkiasse. Joanna kulastab Tatra magesid ja uurib, kuidas on Slovakkia parast iseseisvumist muutunud.

programme.title: Pealtnagija
programme.desc: Pealtnagija on Eesti pikima ajalooga ja teletabelite tipus olev uuriv ajakirjandussaade, mis toob vaatajateni põnevad ja paljastavad lood meie uhiskonna telgitagustest. Lisaks teravatele uurimustele vahendab saade ka haaravaid persoone ja meeldejaavaid reportaaže sundmustest, mille pealtnagijaks tavaline inimene naljalt ei satu. Saatejuhid Mihkel Karmas, Kristjan Pihl, Merilin Parli, Taavi Eilat, Margit Kilumets ja Uljana Kuzmina. Režissoorid Raivo Maripuu ja Vladlen Pobjaržin, produtsent Piret Priisaar.

programme.title: Tana õhtul..

Alma kutsub Allani ja Mare enda juurde - ta on Jaanuselt kirja saanud. Teet Kallase dokumentaaldraama, idee autor Astrid Reinla.

programme.title: Syke
programme.desc: Minister soovib Jariga kohtuda, kuid Jari ei taha teenimata tunnustust vastu võtta ja avaldab tõe. Jannica langetab raske otsuse. Jesse ei taha isa matustel osaleda, kuid Sonja soovitab seda siiski teha. Ilmari kunagine patsient Riina tuleb EMOsse.

programme.title: Luhhike oppetus Eesti kultuurist
programme.desc: Kui Eestimaal hakkas rahvuslik liikumine jumet võtma, ei haaranud eestlane mitte pussi, vaid hoopis hirmsama relva - pasuna! Saatejuhtidel Priit ja Mart Piusil aitavad arkamisajas orienteeruda Jurgen Rooste, Rasmus Puur, Indrek Laul, Kadi Polli ja paljud teised. Sarja stsenarist on Tauno Vahter, režissoor Raivo Maripuu, toimetaja Kai Vaartnõu ning kunstnik Karel Korp.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Kui murukeegli klubi murult leitakse eakas kohtunik tapetuna, sukelduvad Barnaby ja Winter klubi segaste suhete ja hamarate aride maailma.

programme.title: Varvimuusika
programme.desc: Suur vastasseis! Manguvaljakul võtavad mõõtu Eesti meelelahutusmaailma hiiglased Smilers ja Swingers. Kas Mikk Saar ja Mihkel Mattisen korraldavad Sal-Sallerile kambaka või saab kroonimata kuningas Hendrikust kroonitud kuningas? Aukohtunik on Reigo Ahven.

programme.title: Eesti lipp umber maailma 25
programme.desc: 25 aastat tagasi alustas Piritalt teekonda jahtlaev Lennuk. Tehti midagi sellist, mida Eestis varem tehtud ei olnud – pooleteise aastaga sõideti vaikesel purjekal mooda traditsioonilisi mereteid umber maailma. Selle meresõidu patrooniks oli president Meri, seiklustele tormistel ookeanidel elasid kaasa kumned tuhanded reisi jalgijad. Režissoor Jaanus Nõgisto on võtnud kokku meremeeste mõtted toona ja nuud, veerand sajandit hiljem.

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Yha loytamatta - Antti Hanhivaara
programme.desc: Antti Hanhivaaran katoaminen syksylla v. 2006 on noussut Suomen tunnetuimmaksi katoamismysteeriksi useastakin eri syysta. Tapauksen tiimoilta nousee liian monta kysymysmerkkia esille niin Antin ystavien vuoksi kuin paikallisen poliisin toimesta tai paremminkin sanottuna toimimattomuudesta. Tama tutkimus vakuutti meidat siita, etta rajan takana saattaisi olla auttajia kuin myos tutkimuksia haittaavia tahoja vastaamassa.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy digs into succulent sandwiches. In Oakland, theres a killer cheesesteak, and in Modesto, a food truck puts pastrami on pretzel bread.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: With their sights set on defeating Bobby in the tournament finale, returning champs face an unusual beef jerky product and a twist on hummus in round two.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree makes delicious and easy summer eats. She serves up sausage and pepper burgers, cobb chicken salad and key lime pie cheesecake bars.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Hip-hop icon Lil Jon and Anne Burrell get wild in the kitchen with lights, beats and bottle service. Chefs Eva Pesantez and Robert Butts hope to beat Bobby.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Chefs Dan Jackson and Camila Rinaldi are aided and abetted by Sunny Anderson and Jet Tila as they try to slay Bobby Flay. Will they prevail?

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: Jesse Palmer challenges the eight bakers to turn breakfast items into Thanksgiving desserts. Next, the competitors team up to create potluck-inspired desserts.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Four delicatessen pros attempt to prove that they know more than just sandwiches. They start with a combo platter and a fruit with a cult following.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree makes a special Italian-inspired dinner for two. Her date night chicken pasta is accompanied by a colourful everything antipasto salad and 4-cheese flatbreads.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yehs girlfriends are coming over for dinner so shes preparing her go-to special menu. Theres going to be make-ahead sticky Rhubarb Short Ribs, a show-stopping Crispy Saffron Rice dish and a fresh side of Green Beans with Potato Chip Crunch. She then finishes the meal with a sweet treat -- Whipped Cheesecakes with Pistachio Crusts.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh celebrates her favorite time of the year by making a festive buffet for three generations of the family. There are Pastrami Meatballs, Brussels Sprouts Latkes, rolled Potato Flatbreads and her speculoos-inspired Airline Cookie Sheet Cakes. Finally, theres Mollys Mini Marzipan Treats -- a delicious edible gift idea perfect for going under the Christmas tree!

programme.title: Battle Of The Decades
programme.desc: The chefs go back to 1993 with a fruity drink and dunkable cookies. Then, they tackle trendy tiny foods before two chefs mix things up with chicken and waffles.

programme.title: Alex Vs. America

programme.title: Selena + Chef: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Selena Gomez and Chef Claudette Zepeda prepare a Mexican feast for the holidays. Claudette takes Selena back to her roots by making the traditional Latin Christmas dish of Chile Colorado Tamales with a spicy beef filling. As they cook, Claudette teaches Selena and Raquelle some kitchen yoga to help them get through the rest of the festive menu of Roast Ham with Salsa Matcha, Charred Poblano Rice and a uniquely Mexican twist on a historic salad.

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: (Magic Mike XXL 2015). Channing Tatum tanssii ja riisuu jalleen, kun hitiksi noussut draamakomedia Magic Mike saa jatkoa. Stripparin uralta vetaytynyt Mike keskittyy huonekalufirmaansa, mutta veri vetaa lavalle, kun hanen vanhat kaverinsa ovat lahdossa reissuun. Veteraaniryhma paattaa elakoitya tyylilla ja vetaa viela yhden komean shown. Paaosissa: Channing Tatum, Matt Romer, Joe Manganiello, Kevin Nash, Adam Rodriguez, Gabriel Iglesias. Ohjaus: Gregory Jacobs
